text: Eva Steininger-Bludau (21 July 1951 â€“ 9 June 2022) was a German politician. She was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany. She was in the Landtag of North Rhine-Westphalia from 2010 to 2017. She was born in Castrop- Rauxel, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany. Steininger-Bludau died on 9 June 2022 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Eva Steininger-Bludau
